article_title: Spending Spree: Biden legacy at stake
meta_description: In advance of a crucial, make-or-break week for President Joe Biden, in which passage of his signature $3.5 trillion tax and spending plan hangs in the balance, the administration has trotted out a new mantra to win political support for the bill. It’s based on the fanciful concept that it will cost “zero.” As Doug McKelway reports, it’s a plea that passes muster only in the minds of those who can neither add nor subtract.
